newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: RESEARCH ALERT - Avoid Creative - Schroders.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Avoid Creative - Schroders.

text.p: Stock in multi-media firm Creative Technology was rated avoid by Schroders in Singapore on Friday.
Schroders said in a research paper Creative's earnings would be hit by the launch of competing media processors from Cyrix which would seriously erode Creative's market position.
"The new generation of media processors from Cyrix will seriously erode Creative Technology's position in the market place," the report said.

The new processor, released in the United States on Thursday, uses Pentium compatible chips with silicon power for video/graphics and sound functions, a technology the computing sector is very optimistic about, the report said.
Schroders described prospects for Creative as "extremely uncertain".
It said Schroders had cut Creative's earnings expectations for the year to June 1997 by six percent and for the year to June 1998 by 54 percent.
